events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses for upcoming treatments and related costs.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised under Personal Loan based on the applicant's stated purpose and supporting descriptions.
A loan officer was assigned to the case to begin the review and facilitate communication with the applicant.
The loan officer conducted an initial review of the submitted documents and preliminary credit information.
Additional documents such as medical bills, proof of income, and identification were requested to verify the application details.
The applicant promptly submitted all requested documents including medical invoices and recent pay stubs.
A credit check was run to assess the applicant’s creditworthiness and verify their repayment capability.
Risk evaluation was completed based on financials, credit score, and loan purpose to determine the potential risk.
An offer outlining the loan terms, interest rate, and repayment plan was presented to the applicant for consideration.
The applicant responded positively, accepting the proposed loan terms and requesting next steps for approval.
The application was escalated to senior management for final approval due to loan amount exceeding standard limits.
Senior management reviewed the case thoroughly and formally approved the personal loan application.
Funds were successfully disbursed into the applicant’s bank account to cover the planned medical expenses.
Follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant’s satisfaction and provide support for repayment scheduling.
The loan case was officially closed after confirming all processes were complete and the applicant was fully informed.
